title: COVID cases in India decline further; 1,096 new infections reported in last 24 hrs
description: As the declining trend of COVID-19 cases in the country continues, India on Sunday reported 1,096 new infections in the last 24 hours, as per the Union Health Ministry.
content: As the declining trend of COVID-19 cases in the country continues, India on Sunday reported 1,096 new infections in the last 24 hours, as per the Union Health Ministry. With this, the active caseload of the virus in India stands at 13,013, constituti... [1157 chars]

title: China expects sharp drop in holiday travel due to COVID outbreaks
description:
China's transport ministry expects a 20% drop in road traffic and a 55% fall in flights during the three-day Qingming holiday due to a flare-up of COVID-19 cases in the country.
China on Sunday reported a total of 13,287 new daily cases for April 2, the highest level since February 2020. The country's "dynamic clearance" COVID policy has dampened consumption of transportation fuels in China.
content: China's transport ministry expects a 20% drop in road traffic and a 55% fall in flights during the three-day Qingming holiday due to a flare-up of COVID-19 cases in the country. More than 27 Chinese provinces and regions have recently reported corona... [1372 chars]

title: India logs 1,096 new Covid-19 cases
description: The death toll climbed to 5,21,345 with 81 fresh fatalities, the data updated at 8 am stated.
content:
